homepage.features.easyToUse.description.message: Lichess Studies are very easy to create and use, but they are very powerful and have many, sometimes hidden, features.

homepage.features.whatMatters.descriptio.message: This documentation helps you get started and attempts to bridge the gap from "what you should know at the beginning" to "how to use advanced features to achieve surprising results."

homepage.features.surprisingResults.desc.message: Everything from game analyses, teaching units, self-learning materials, and also integration with the rest of the world.
